resources.string:
App Name : AZ Health Monitor

 Version : 1.0

 Author : Abhishek Zambre

 Website : abhiz.me

 Class : Master of Computer Science (MCS), Arizona State University

 Description : Develop an UI similar to the Matlab UI for android phones. Use the emulator to display the UI. For graphing use the graphView class provided in the course web page. Take a sample array of floats. Whenever the Run button is hit the array is plotted in the canvass. On clicking the stop button the view is cleared.

 Features : Light sensor is used to generate values based on the recorded sensor data.
